name: Halobat - Laravel (SQLite)
postCreateCommand: composer install --no-interaction --no-progress --optimize-autoloader || true; if [ -f package.json ]; then npm ci --no-audit --no-fund; fi; if [ ! -f .env ]; then cp .env.example .env; fi; php -r "file_exists('database/database.sqlite') || touch('database/database.sqlite');"; sed -i 's/^DB_CONNECTION=.*/DB_CONNECTION=sqlite/' .env || true; sed -i 's#^DB_DATABASE=.*#DB_DATABASE=database/database.sqlite#' .env || true; php artisan key:generate || true; php artisan migrate --force || true
